item.description:
Join us for a super fun and delicious meet up! We're going along with Boston Chocolate Tours on a walking tour and sampling of chocolate places in Boston's Beacon Hill. Tickets for group members are only $30, a discount from the usual $48.

We will be sampling chocolate at each of our stops. Stops along our way include: Savenor's Market, Beacon Hill Chocolates, Twig, 75 Chestnut, Finale and The Melting Pot.

Please note tickets are non refundable and must be purchased in advance. To buy tickets please call 781-780-3858 or buy online at www.bostonchocolatetours.com
When you buy online, make sure you buy for the Sunday, April 11, 1pm Beacon Hill Chocolate tour and use coupon code: MeetUp to get the discount.

We will meet outside of Savenor's Market. If you have trouble finding us, or running late, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.

This will be a joint event with the Metro West Young Professionals group.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) outside Savenor's Market- please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Beacon Hill Official Chocolate Tour and Sampling!, Discount tickets
